name: Meteor Shower Damage
tooltip:
[<d ref="duckiesHeroUpgrader_BlizzardDamageLVLDummy.amount" style="Bold"/>/<d ref="2" style="Bold"/>] 

Increase Meteor Shower total damage by <d ref="duckiesHeroUpgrader_BlizzardDamageUpgrade.set_values[0].target_value*duckiesHeroCaster_PeriodicPersistent.periodic.count*(duckiesHeroCasterBlizzard_InitialPersistent.periodic.count+1)" style="Bold"/> and frozen waste duration by <d ref="(duckiesHeroUpgrader_BlizzardDamageUpgrade.set_values[1].target_value)*duckiesHeroCasterBlizzard_GroundPersistent.periodic.durations[0]" style="Bold"/> seconds.
